api.body:
require "pixcHelper"
require "pixcProtocolMidi"
if self.pixcHelper ~= nil then
	return 
end
self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
if self.protocol == nil then
	self.protocol = createPixcProtocolMidi()
end
self.token = 0
self.freshMode = 0
self.ready = true
self.running = false
self.midiInDev = self.helper:getProperty("Midi In Device","")
self.midiOutDev = self.helper:getProperty("Midi Out Device","")
self.disableLog = self.helper.toBool(self.helper:getProperty("Disable Logs","true"))
self.learn = self.helper.toBool(self.helper:getProperty("Learn"))
self._learnNote = self.helper.toBool(self.helper:getProperty("Learn Note"))
self.protocol:setStatusCallbacks(
	function (...) pixc.log(...) end)
if self.midiOutDev ~= nil and self.midiOutDev ~= "" then
	self.protocol:openMidiOutDevice(self.midiOutDev)
end
self.MidiInCallbacks = {}
self.MidiInCallbacks["note"] = self.Receive.Note.recvNote
self.MidiInCallbacks["polymorphicAftertouch"] = self.Receive.Polymorphic.recvPolymorphicAftertouch
self.MidiInCallbacks["controlChange"] = self.Receive.ControlChange.recvControlChange
self.MidiInCallbacks["programChange"] = self.Receive.ProgramChange.recvProgramChange
self.MidiInCallbacks["channelAfterTouch"] = self.Receive.ChannelAftertouch.recvChannelAftertouch
self.MidiInCallbacks["pitchBlend"] = self.Receive.PitchBlend.recvPitchBlend
self.MidiInCallbacks["sysEx"] = self.Receive.SysEx.recvSysEx
self.MidiInCallbacks["mtc"] = self.Timecode.Internal.timecodeFunction
if self.midiInDev ~= nil and self.midiInDev ~= "" then
	self.protocol:openMidiInDevice(self.midiInDev,self.MidiInCallbacks)
end
if self.interval == nil then
	self.interval = pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.setInterval(
		function()
			self.Timecode.Internal.checkInput()
	  	end, 50)
end
if self.intervalExecuteTimecode == nil then
	self.intervalExecuteTimecode = pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.setInterval(
		function()
			self.Timecode.timecodeToTimeline()
	  	end, 1000)
end
api.name: init

api.body:
self.Timecode.Timecode(nil)
self.running = false
self.ready = true
self.freshMode = 2
self.Timecode.timecodeToTimeline()

if self.interval ~= nil then
	pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.clearInterval(self.interval)
	self.interval = nil
end
if self.intervalExecuteTimecode ~= nil then
	pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.clearInterval(self.intervalExecuteTimecode)
	self.intervalExecuteTimecode = nil
end

if self.protocol == nil then return end
self.helper = nil
self.protocol:close()
self.protocol = nil
api.name: uninit

elems.body:
if error then 
	if not self.disableLog  then pixc.log(error) end
else 
	if on == true then
		if not self.disableLog then
			pixc.log( "Note("..note..") On: channel("..channel..") velocity("..velocity..")") 
		end
	else
		if not self.disableLog then
			pixc.log( "Note("..note..") Off: channel("..channel..") velocity("..velocity..")") 
		end
	end
end
local n = self.midiNoteList(note-20)
if n == nil then n = note end
local ch = tostring(math.floor(math.abs(channel+1)))
if self._learnNote then
	self.learnNote()
	self.helper:setProperty("Last Received Note","Channel: " .. ch .. " Note: " .. n .. " Value: " .. velocity)
	self.helper:setProperty("Note Action Name","Ch" .. ch .. "_Note_" .. string.gsub(n,"#","Sharp"))
else
	if self.Receive.Note["Ch" .. ch .. "_Note_" .. string.gsub(n,"#","Sharp")] ~= nil then
		self.Receive.Note["Ch" .. ch .. "_Note_" .. string.gsub(n,"#","Sharp")](velocity)
	end
end
--pixc.log("Channel: " .. channel .. " Note: " .. self.midiNoteList(note-20) .. " Value: " .. velocity)
elems.name: recvNote

elems.body:
if error then 
	if self.disableLog == false then	pixc.log(error) end
else 
	if self.disableLog == false then
		pixc.log( "PolyMophicAfterTouch("..note.."): channel("..channel..") value("..value..")") 
	end
end
elems.name: recvPolymorphicAftertouch

elems.body:
if error then 
	if self.disableLog == false then	pixc.log(error) end
else 
	if self.disableLog == false then pixc.log( "ControlChange: channel("..channel..") controller("..controller..") value("..value..")") end
end
local ch = tostring(math.floor(math.abs(channel+1)))
local cc = tostring(math.floor(math.abs(controller)))
if self._learnCC then
	self.learnCC()
	self.helper:setProperty("Last Received CC","Channel: " .. ch .. " CC: " .. cc .. " Value: " .. value)
	self.helper:setProperty("CC Action Name","Ch" .. ch .. "_CC_" .. cc)
else
	if self.Receive.ControlChange["Ch" .. ch .. "_CC_" .. cc] ~= nil then
		self.Receive.ControlChange["Ch" .. ch .. "_CC_" .. cc](value)
	end
end
elems.name: recvControlChange

elems.body:
if error then 
	if self.disableLog == false then	pixc.log(error) end
else 
	if self.disableLog == false then pixc.log( "ProgramChange: channel("..channel..") device("..device..")") end
end
local ch = tostring(math.floor(math.abs(channel+1)))
local pc = tostring(math.floor(math.abs(device)))
if self._learnPC then
	self.learnPC()
	self.helper:setProperty("Last Received PC","Channel: " .. ch .. " PC: " .. pc)
	self.helper:setProperty("PC Action Name","Ch" .. ch .. "_PC_" .. pc)
else
	if self.Receive.ProgramChange["Ch" .. ch .. "_PC_" .. pc] ~= nil then
		self.Receive.ProgramChange["Ch" .. ch .. "_PC_" .. pc]()
	end
end

else

elems.name: recvPitchBlend

elems.body:
local msg = ""
local msgTable = {}
if dataTable ~= nil and type(dataTable) == "table" then
	for i,_ in pairs(dataTable) do
		local hex = string.format("%x", _)
		if string.len(hex) == 1 then
			hex = "0" .. hex
		end
		msg = msg .. hex
		table.insert(msgTable,hex)
	end
end

if error then 
	if self.disableLog == false then	pixc.log(error) end
else 
	if self.disableLog == false then pixc.log( "SysEx: Data(".. msg	..")") end
end

if msg ~= "" then
	--Send table to next Module
	--pixc.callRefs(msgTable)
	--Send string to next Module
	pixc.callRefs(msg)
else
	--if nothing is comming in don't call next Module
	pixc.suppressCallRefs()
end
elems.name: recvSysEx

api.name: getOutDevices

elems.body:
local mtcList = self.helper.stringSplit(mtc,":")

self.fps = fps
if fps == 24 then self.Timecode.TimecodeMode("24 FPS") self.mode = 1
elseif fps == 25 then self.Timecode.TimecodeMode("25 FPS") self.mode = 2
elseif fps == 29.97 then self.Timecode.TimecodeMode("30 FPS - Drop Frames") self.fps = 30 self.mode = 3
elseif fps == 30 then self.Timecode.TimecodeMode("30 FPS") self.mode = 5 end

self.Timecode.Timecode(mtc)

self.totalFrame = mtcList[4] + mtcList[3] * self.fps + mtcList[2] *60* self.fps + mtcList[1]*60*60* self.fps

if self.running == false then
	self.freshMode = 1
	self.token = self.token+1
end
self.running = true
self.ready = true
elems.name: timecodeFunction

elems.body:
if self.ready ~= true and self.running == true then
	self.running = false
	self.ready = true
	self.freshMode = 2
	self.token = self.token+1
	self.Timecode.timecodeToTimeline()
else
	self.ready = false
end
elems.name: checkInput

elems.body:
if self.fps == nil then return end
if val == nil then
	if self.timecode ~= nil then
		pixc.callRefs(tonumber(self.timecode[1]),tonumber(self.timecode[2]),tonumber(self.timecode[3]),tonumber(self.timecode[4]),false,self.mode)
		pixc.report(self.timecode[1] .. ":" .. self.timecode[2] .. ":" .. self.timecode[3] .. ":" .. self.timecode[4])
	end
	return
end
local timecode = self.helper.stringSplit(val,":")
pixc.report(val)

if timecode == nil or timecode[1] == nil or timecode[2] == nil or timecode[3] == nil or timecode[4] == nil or self.fps == nil then
	return
end

local totalFrames = tonumber(timecode[1])*60*60*self.fps + tonumber(timecode[2])*60*self.fps + tonumber(timecode[3]) * self.fps + tonumber(timecode[4])

if self.totalFrame ~= nil and totalFrames ~= self.totalFrame+1 then
		pixc.warn("Incoming Timecode Jumped!")
		self.freshMode = 2
		self.token = self.token+1
		self.timecode = timecode
		self.Timecode.timecodeToTimeline()
		self.running = false
	return
end

if self.timecode ~= nil and (
	self.timecode[1] ~= timecode[1] or
	self.timecode[2] ~= timecode[2] or
	self.timecode[3] ~= timecode[3] or
	self.timecode[4] ~= timecode[4]) then

else
	self.freshMode = 2
end
	
self.timecode = timecode

return val
elems.name: Timecode

elems.body:
self._TimecodeMode = pixcCommon.execAttribute(0, self._TimecodeMode, val, doSet)
return self._TimecodeMode
elems.name: TimecodeMode

elems.body:
if self.timecode ~= nil and
	self.running ~= nil and
	self.freshMode ~= nil and
	self.mode ~= nil then

	if self._muteState == true then 
		return 
	end

	local rxTimeFreshStart = pixc.callRefs(tonumber(self.timecode[1]),tonumber(self.timecode[2]),tonumber(self.timecode[3]),tonumber(self.timecode[4]),self.rxTimeFreshStart,self.running, self.freshMode, self.token,self.mode)

	if rxTimeFreshStart == nil or rxTimeFreshStart[1] == nil or rxTimeFreshStart[1][1] == nil then
		return
	end
	
	if self.freshMode == 1 or self.freshMode == 2 then
		if self.freshMode == 1 then
			self.rxTimeFreshStart = rxTimeFreshStart[1][1]
		else
			self.rxTimeFreshStart = 0
		end
		if rxTimeFreshStart[1][1] == -1 then
			return 
		end
		self.freshMode = 0
	else
		if rxTimeFreshStart[1][1] == -1 then
			self.freshMode = 2
		end
	end
end
elems.documentation: Connect this function to the Timeline setTimecodeInput function or Compound setTimecodeInput and set the Timeline SMPTE Mode to receive.
elems.name: timecodeToTimeline

api.body:
if self.helper == nil then
	require "pixcHelper"
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end

self.disableLog = self.helper.toBool(state)
api.name: disableLog

api.body:
if self.helper == nil then
	require "pixcHelper"
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end

if state == nil then 
	self.helper:setProperty("Learn Note","false")
end

self._learnNote = self.helper.toBool(self.helper:getProperty("Learn Note"))
api.name: learnNote

api.body:
local _name = self.helper:getProperty("Note Action Name")
local _min = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("Note Min Out"))
local _max = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("Note Max Out"))

if _name == nil then return end
local json = require "json"
if self.helper == nil then
	require "pixcHelper"
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end
local module = {{cont="true", name="recvNote"}}

for i,n in pairs(self.Receive.Note) do
	if type(n) == "function" then
		if i ~= _name and i ~= "recvNote" then
			table.insert(module,{cont="true", name=i})
		end
	end
end
	local temp = {}
	temp.kind = "func"
	temp.slotStyle = "leftNone;rightOut;triggerHidden"
	temp.params = {{name="val"}}
	temp.name = _name
	if _min == 0 and _max == 127 then
		temp.body = "pixc.callRefs(val,true)"
	else
		temp.body = "local res = self.range(0,127,".. _min .."," .. _max .. ",val)\npixc.callRefs(res,true)"
	end
	table.insert(module,temp)

self().dynamicRebuildFromDescriptions(json.encode(module), "Receive.Note", "(.*)")
api.name: buildNote

api.body:
local out = 0

if val ~= nil and minIn ~= nil and maxIn ~= nil and minOut ~= nil and maxOut ~= nil then
	local rangeSizeIn = maxIn - minIn
	if rangeSizeIn ~= 0 then
		out = (val - minIn)/rangeSizeIn * (maxOut - minOut) + minOut
	end
end

return out
api.name: range

api.body:
local _name = self.helper:getProperty("CC Action Name")
local _min = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("CC Min Out"))
local _max = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("CC Max Out"))
local _minI = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("CC Min In"))
local _maxI = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("CC Max In"))

if _name == nil then return end
local json = require "json"
if self.helper == nil then
	require "pixcHelper"
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end
local module = {{cont="true", name="recvControlChange"}}

for i,n in pairs(self.Receive.ControlChange) do
	if type(n) == "function" then
		if i ~= _name and i ~= "recvControlChange" then
			table.insert(module,{cont="true", name=i})
		end
	end
end
	local temp = {}
	temp.kind = "func"
	temp.slotStyle = "leftNone;rightOut;triggerHidden"
	temp.params = {{name="val"}}
	temp.name = _name
	if _min == _minI and _max == _maxI then
		temp.body = "pixc.callRefs(val,true)"
	else
		temp.body = "local res = self.range(" .. _minI .. "," .. _maxI .. ",".. _min .."," .. _max .. ",val)\npixc.callRefs(res,true)"
	end
	table.insert(module,temp)

self().dynamicRebuildFromDescriptions(json.encode(module), "Receive.ControlChange", "(.*)")
api.name: buildControlChange

api.body:
local json = require "json"
if self.helper == nil then
	require "pixcHelper"
	self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
end
local str = ""
if folder == "ChannelAftertouch" then
	str = "recvChannelAftertouch"
elseif folder == "Note" then
	str = "recvNote"
elseif folder == "Polymorphic" then
	str = "recvPolymorphicAftertouch"
elseif folder == "ControlChange" then
	str = "recvControlChange"
elseif folder == "ProgramChange" then
	str = "recvProgramChange"
elseif folder == "PitchBlend" then
	str = "recvPitchBlend"
elseif folder == "SysEx" then
	str = "recvSysEx"
else
	return
end
local module = {{cont="true", name=str}}

self().dynamicRebuildFromDescriptions(json.encode(module), "Receive." .. folder, "(.*)")
api.name: resetActions

properties.cont: To use Midi SysEx messages as Table comment out the string message and in the Table Massege.  To Use Midi Timecode connect timcodeToTimeline function with Timeline setTimecodeInput function and set the Timeline to receive
properties.name: Description
